name: FDE
description:
The aliens are trying to take away treasure from the city, everything in the city is a mess. As a soldier, help the citizens and the captain to defend the city from the aliens. Talk to the captain and ask for instructions, interact with some of the elements in the scene. There are 3 places you can go to, the city, the storehouse and the space, feel free to explore.

Control: 

Talk to Captain: type in "ask captain..."/ "talk to captain about..."

Interact with scene elements: type in "poke..."

Get or drop: type in "get..." or "drop"

Craft: type in "combine... and ..."

Change scene: type in "go to..." and "go back"
